name: The Tracks (prototype)
description:
the train has crashed but you must keep going. the handcar still works- it's your only chance to make it through the Overlap alive.

THE TRACKS is an early prototype. not a game, it's more of a dark ride/environment test. it's my first unity project and as a result quite rough around the edges but i hope you enjoy!

CONTROLS: hold W to advance forward, use the mouse to look around, right-click to zoom in.

WARNING: one section has flashing lights, and a loud noise.

made in a couple of weeks for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Screams 2020 Game Jam - check it out!

windows only at the moment. full list of assets used is located in the readme.
